Html:
Hi

A while back a spike was released under AGComposite code that provided a basic Commanding implementation for ButtonBase.
I would assume that a more fully featured Commanding port to Silverlight is on the cards as part of Prism V2, but can anyone provide a date/release target for when this could be seen in a drop?

Thanks

Paul

Hi

 

The team that is developing Prism V2 is planning to add this feature in a future drop. However, the feature does not have a target date for its release.

You should keep an eye on the Prism V2 release page to check when Commanding is included.

 

Please let me know if this helps.

 

Damian Schenkelman

http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
